thread.title: Revisiting PM Modi’s town hall at Facebook, ahead of Mark Zuckerberg’s Delhi visit
thread.title_full: Revisiting PM Modi’s town hall at Facebook, ahead of Mark Zuckerberg’s Delhi visit - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Revisiting PM Modi’s town hall at Facebook, ahead of Mark Zuckerberg’s Delhi visit
text: Mark Zuckerberg is visiting India on October 28, and will be conducting a town hall Q&A session at IIT-Delhi. In September the Facebook CEO hosted a similar session at the Menlo Park campus along with Narendra Modi . In addition to answering questions from attendees, there was a moment just before the end which saw the Indian Prime Minister break down. Just before ending the town hall, Modi turned to Zuckerberg’s parents in the front row and saluted them for giving birth to a man who has helped connect the world. He then talked about his parents, especially his mother and her struggles while bringing him up. Modi recollected the early days when his mother had to go to the neighbor’s houses to clean dishes »
